title: (x) "Kim's Salon" similar to Monotype Corsiva - ITC Zapf Chancery {Nick Curtis}
content:
Thanks in advance...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [KimsSalon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228161428/http:/typophile.com/files/KimsSalon.jpg) | 26.36 KB |
author: planet_embroidery

comments.content: It's [Zapf Chancery Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228161428/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-zapf-chancery/italic/), a typeface which, IMHO, should NEVER be used all caps, as in your example.
Now this is _seriously_ bad! Ouch, what a train wreck of a logo!
Careful Yves Kim is very touchy about unfavorable critiques... Shes a mafioso hair artist... If she puts the word out on you, your next hair cut will be bald condensed. LOL
